actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend title 23 of the United States Code to add 28 miles to the Interstate System and provide for the inclusion of a critical north-south highway corridor.

summary.text: Authorizes the construction of a 28-mile addition to the Interstate System of Highways between Milford and East Stroudsbury in Pennsylvania. (Amends 23 U.S.C. 103(e)(3))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 23 of the United States Code to add 28 miles to the Interstate System and provide for the inclusion of a critical north-south highway corridor.
